mainSequence.step: Alice_novice receives treasury address from grantstreasury
Alice_novice gets positive/negative feedback from forum
Alice_novice submits treasury role proposal to bitdaogovernance
Alice_novice receives success/fail confirmation from bitdaogovernance
TokenHolders_novice vote on proposal at bitdaogovernance
TokenHolders_novice receive treasury role vote confirmation from bitdaogovernance
BitDAOAdmins_expert gets Alice's proposal result from bitdaogovernance
BitDAOTreasury transfers funds to grants treasury
Grantstreasury receives funds transfer from bitdaotreasury
Alice_novice receives transfer confirmation from grantstreasury
